name: Just_a_Dream
description:
You’re a child, and you’re in a dream. As you love dreaming, you want to stay in the dream as long as possible. But it gets difficult when you wake up in an empty field, and, when you touch things, other things appear, things scarier than the ones before..

The game is free for now on Game Jolt but in the future it will be paid and will be published here.

I spent like a month developing it, so I hope you will all enjoy the game and won't be too scared!
